sentences.en: " What a coincidence! I work for the Minnesota Twins baseball team! "
sentences.cn: “ 多巧 啊 !我在明尼苏达州的双胞胎棒球队工作! ”

sentences.en: In a few minutes Heller called in from Minnesota.
sentences.cn: 几分钟以后,赫勒从明尼苏达州打来了电话.

sentences.en: In previous years, Stacy Hansen would either host a large Thanksgiving meal or fly from her Florida home to be with family in Minnesota. Not this year.
sentences.cn: 在前几年，斯泰西·汉森将举办大型的感恩节餐，或从她的佛罗里达州的家中飞往明尼苏达州的亲友家。但今年没有。

sentences.en: It was my first day on campus. The Winona State University of Minnesota, a small but neat and clean school.
sentences.cn: 这是我在大学的第一天，明尼苏达州的威诺娜州立大学，一所虽小却干净整洁的校园。

sentences.en: Many people in Minnesota and Tennessee have noticeable regional accents.
sentences.cn: 明尼苏达州和田纳西州的许多人都有明显的地区口音。

sentences.en: Mike Miller , Minnesota: Need one guy to knock down a deep 3 - pointer?
sentences.cn: 迈克米勒, 明尼苏达森林狼: 需要一名能终结比赛的3分手?

sentences.en: Minnesota Architecture is your best partner on your to success.
sentences.cn: 明尼苏答建筑设计是您走向成功的最佳伙伴.

sentences.en: The Minnesota State Capitaol building is made of white granite and marble.
sentences.cn: 明尼苏达州的州议会建筑是由白色花岗岩和大理石建成的.

sentences.en: The Minnesota Vikings signed Herschel Walker from the Dallas Cowboys.
sentences.cn: 明尼苏达维京人队签下了来自达拉斯牛仔队的赫舍尔·沃克。

sentences.en: The Minnesota work on kaersutite also showed the presence of the isotope neon - 21.
sentences.cn: 明尼苏达大学关于钛角闪石的研究表明,其中也存在同位素氖 - 21.

sentences.en: The Mississippi River joins the Minnesota River 13 km downstream from St. Anthony Falls.
sentences.cn: 密西西比河在距圣安东尼瀑布十三公里处与明尼苏达河交汇.

sentences.en: The Rockets outrebounded Minnesota 46 - 31 through three quarters and led 69 - 60 .
sentences.cn: 前三节,火箭篮板球领先森林狼46:31,比分上以 69:60 领先.

sentences.en: There is a woman in Minnesota who can be saved by your friend's heart.
sentences.cn: 在明尼苏达有个妇女,你朋友的心脏可以救她的命.

sentences.en: Therefore, Alston started in rocket training battalion to go Minnesota.
sentences.cn: 为此, 阿尔斯通在火箭训练营开始前去了一趟明尼苏达.

sentences.en: They saw the junction of the Mississippi and the Minnesota.
sentences.cn: 他们看到了密西西比河和明尼苏达河的汇合处.

sentences.en: This is a picture of a weasel I found in Northern Minnesota.
sentences.cn: 这是我在明尼苏达州北部所发现的一只黄鼠的照片。

sentences.en: Tonight, Daisy could tell Leah that shes going back to Minnesota.
sentences.cn: 今晚, 戴西应该告诉利厄说她要回明尼苏达.

sentences.en: Yee moved to Minnesota, and in 1995 the couple wed.
sentences.cn: 余素兰后来移居明尼苏达州, 1995年,这一对结婚了.
